body.p: Post‑employment benefits include items such as the following:

li.p: retirement benefits (eg pensions and lump sum payments on retirement); and
other post‑employment benefits, such as post‑employment life insurance and post‑employment medical care.

body.p: Arrangements whereby an entity provides post‑employment benefits are post‑employment benefit plans. An entity applies this Standard to all such arrangements whether or not they involve the establishment of a separate entity to receive contributions and to pay benefits.
